ygData.subject: Re: After the pain. (OOC:)
ygData.msgSnippet: Just because four bots rode him doesnt mean he got any bigger. Making your bot grow to 80 feet long is cheap and should be illegal. he could crush someone, no

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

Just because four bots rode him doesnt mean he got any bigger. Making your 
bot grow to 80 feet long is cheap and should be illegal. he could crush 
someone, no matter if hes 80 feet long or tall. It simply isnt fair. And If I 
use your reasoning I guess I can make Gemini Dragon grow to well over 125 
feet tall simply because its a gestalt and suddenly it can grow. And not 
everything that was legal before is legal now. Shooting weapons fire heading 
at your charachter was once legal and is now illegal. Seeking weapons were 
once legal, now they aren't.

--part1_b9.11c4de1f.289f30c9_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
